title: Replace 67 Clicker character with uploaded Tung Tung Tung image

requirements.text: Save the uploaded image (IMG_0282.jpeg) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/tung-character.dim_300x300.png and use it as the central clickable character in the TungTungGame component (frontend/src/components/games/TungTungGame.tsx). Replace any previously programmatically drawn drum/stick figure with this image rendered on the canvas. The image should pulse/scale slightly when idle and shake/flash on click, consistent with the existing clicker game hit effect mechanics.

quotes: Make this into the tung tung tung clicker

acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded wooden stick character image is displayed as the central clickable target in TungTungGame
Clicking the character still triggers the TUNG! hit effect with flash/shake animation and score increment
The idle pulsing animation is applied to the character image
The combo multiplier and best score mechanics remain intact

constraints: Do not alter the TungTungGame gameplay mechanics (combo multiplier, score, best score, TUNG! effect)
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Changing the game title or seed entry

edits: Crop and resize to a square with transparent-friendly framing, preserving the wooden stick character subject (IMG_0282.jpeg > tung-character.dim_300x300.png)
